desc:
This function is called everytime a key is pressed.

When the button is held for a little bit longer, this function will be called multiple times with `isrepeat` as true.
notes: Besure to call Controls("keyboard") in the first line of the game !
The keyboard on android can be closed by the user, so to reshow it you should call textinput(true` in _touchpressed() callback.

args.name: key
args.desc: The pressed button, check KeyConstants Enum.

args.name: scancode
args.desc: The scancode representing the pressed key, check Scancodes Enum.

args.name: isrepeat
args.desc: Whether this keypress event is a repeat. The delay between key repeats depends on the user's system settings.
